column2:
"You're a lifesaver! For a while there,
I thought I was going to totally blow
this one!"

"Sorry for all the trouble, partner. At least I
learned my lesson. I'll think before I
promise something next time."

"Here's your half of the reward.
Well, see ya! And thanks!"

"助かったー！
一時はどうなることかと思ったぜ。"

"相棒にも手間かけさせちまったな。
これに懲りて、安請け合いはしないよう
気をつけるよ。"

"これ報酬の分け前。
んじゃ、ありがとな。"
